about_the_game:
The Take Care of the Paperwork soundtrack includes the entire set of music that is played within TCOTP as well as a couple of extra tracks that are not included within the game but were created with that intention.

The soundtrack itself is composed mostly of original piano scores with a few synths as well as a couple of piano cover renditions. This DLC includes MP3, WAV, and FLAC copies of the entire soundtrack.

Track List:

  • paperwork
  • calm down
  • chopin's op27 no2 (piano cover)
  • grip
  • take care
  • talking ambience
  • chopin's op28 no4 (piano cover)
  • memory of beach (piano cover)


The files will be located under the Take Care of the Paperwork game folder on your harddrive (ex. \Steam\steamapps\common\Take Care of the Paperwork\TCOTP Soundtrack).
